extendedInfo.description: Flexpansion's advanced word prediction dramatically increases your typing speed in ALL apps. Type using abbreviations, like a txt msg, and Flexpansion automatically expands into full, correctly-spelled text.Flexpansion provides everything you'd expect from a predictive text system, including fully-adaptive word completion, next word prediction, editable user dictionary and autocorrect. But also, our unique "Abbreviation expansion" mode understands all common abbreviation styles. For example: * wd â would * xprc â experience * tfon â telephone * lrng â learning * 2mrw â tomorrow * 428 â fortunate * abv8n â abbreviationNo need to memorize anything. No need to pre-define abbreviations. Our Flexible Text Expansion engine deals with whatever you type and learns rapidly from your usage.Flexpansion â¦ * â¦ has an advanced predictive text engine which learns your personal style and continuously improves its suggestions. * â¦ is compatible with phones, tablets, and hardware keyboards. * â¦ is easily personalized by adding your own abbreviations, words and even whole phrases (a limited number in the free version, unlimited in Flexpansion Pro). For instance set 'qq' (or anything you like) to insert your signature, phone number, or any other frequently-typed block of text.* â¦ is derived from the founder's PhD research at Edinburgh University.* â¦ as well as helping you type faster, may even improve your spelling!Other features: * Long-press and swipe for punctuation, numbers, or accented letters * Long-press Enter for smileys * Long-press Space to enter input unaltered and learn itÂ * Long-press ?123 for speech (if supported by device, needs internet). * Switchable visual themes or skins: Donut (free), Gingerbread (free), Festive (free), Typewriter, Computer, Red, Blue, Green, Pink. * Switchable sound themes: Android (free), Festive (free), Mechanical (free), Electric, Model M, Drums, Beep. * Swipe left on the keyboard to undo an expansion, or delete the previous word. Swipe right to redo. * Swipe down to disable prediction, up to force-enable. * Swipe down again to hide the keyboard, tap a text box to bring it back. * Caps Lock, then swipe to move up/down/left/right in text.Â * Option to remove keypress popups. * Learn from Gmail (BETA) and ANYTHING pasted in.Try out the variety of sounds in each theme - turn your phone into an old-fashioned typewriter complete with dinging carriage return, play a set of party sounds, or a drum kit while you type!Available languages: * US English * UK English * German (QWERTZ layout available) * Coming soon: Spanish * If you'd like to be a pre-release tester for a new language, or want your language added, please contact us!A system message on installation states this app could collect personal data. Rest assured your language data is only stored on your device, never sent across the Internet. We will never record typing in password boxes. We are a responsible company, with academic and government support, which you can verify by searching for "Flexpansion Edinburgh University".To switch input methods, long-press in text box and choose "Select Input Method" or use the status bar icon (later Androids).We think you will love how rapidly Flexpansion begins adapting to your writing style - check out our great reviews. Please rate us!-----Known issues: * Still learning some junk from Gmail, e.g. typos & too many capitals. We are working on this. * A few apps block prediction, and won't let us over-ride. Please contact us AND them!If you have any problems or feature requests, please contact us via our website.We're a small company and will do our best. Thanks for your patience!tags: best android keyboard,keyboards,texting pro,compact,a.i.type free,swiftkey,touchpal,slideit,go hackers keyboard,perfect,aitype,swype

reviews.title: 2 thumbs up
reviews.comment: This FREE keyboard is as good as  AI Keyboard and Swifkey in it\'s own way, it\'s not like comparing apples to apples. I love the fact that u can create abbreviations for words or sentences which is so useful also deleting words by swiping accross the keyboard is very helpful to.  I really like this u get so much in the package and it\'s free so as long as there no problems I will upgrade to the paid version to show my support to creator/creators for creating such a good App. Cheers

reviews.comment: Best keyboard ever!I love the big letters & the abbreviation feature rocks! All the themes 2 choose from is another cool thing I like.. i also love the fact that ads dont pop up all the time  4 the free version.Skip the rest of them because this is the best!! (UPDATED REVIEW) I Still like it but dont use it as often as I did once I bought the full vsn it seemed to loose its memory switched back 2 my  factory keyboard that came on my phone predicts my words much more

reviews.comment: It learns your style well and has more no of predictions that swift key which has 3 primary predictions but this has many and accurate ....better themes and very stable ...go for it

reviews.title: Works well on my droid razr. Prediction is very good.
reviews.comment: Hasn\'t crashed my phone. Themes are a nice touch. Letters are big & easy to see.
reviews.author: Paul Nicholas

reviews.title: Best predictions
reviews.comment: The developer is quick to reply to inquiries. I find this to be a superior keyboard. The ability to personalize the predictions are on or above par with swiftkey. The ability to learn words from ANYTHING with copy and paste is amazing. No other keyboard has this feature that I know of. The more I use it, the smarter it gets. The abbreviations alone save typing and time. I encourage you to buy the pro version so development can be. accelerated. I recommend.
reviews.author: E Zane Wood

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: I am daily searching for the perfect keyboard. Flex has shot up the rankings in stunning fashion. The predictive capability has improved to the point of being better than Swiftkey. The keyboards are far more visually appealing than what most others have to offer as well. The personal dictionary is the most user friendly I have encountered anywhere thus far. Flex has come back. Great work! 3/23: With the addition of keyboard resizing options, this is officially the Swiftkey killer! I love this keyboard!!
reviews.author: Brian Chicago

reviews.title: Great keyboard
reviews.comment: Love this keyboard. Great functions offered, even on the free version.  Am particularly loving the next word prediction and swipe gestures.  It has made typing on my tablet particularly enjoyable. .. and I am using it to type this comment. Would be nice to see a \"swype\" functionality built into the keyboard, though.
